thread.section_title: Milan Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Milan Direct | www.milandirect.com.au
thread.title: amy nuyen
thread.title_full: Milan Direct reviewed by amy nuyen

author: amy nuyen
title: amy nuyen
text:
We purchased a Milan Direct sofa bed on the Temple webster store. I originally called up the Temple webster team to ask for advice on which sofa bed to purchase and the lady was very helpful.
Sofa bed just arrived, and it is exactly as shown on the website & very comfy indeed :) will be back
